messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
{~J1(4.0)}Not again...!?{~N}No, this time it feels different.
{~J1(4.5)}Rather than shifting{~N}from reality to a nightmare,
{~J1(4.5)}this is more like reality{~N}becoming a nightmare.
{~J1(6.0)}I don't like this feeling.{~N}Like something bad{~N}will happen...
Could Cybil have gotten{~N}to the Amusement Park from here?{~E}
